page.title: 16CHURCHES IN IRWELL VALLEY -1
page.content: In this area there are several churches of various denominations. { {CHURCH OF ENGLAND} { {Edenfield Parish Church}was built in 1778,and is the oldest church in the area.The vicar is Reverend G. Higham, who is also minister at St.Philip's Church,Stubbins.Inside the church are the original family box pews and a balcony runing round three sides.The church is unusual in having no patron saint. { {St. Philip's Church Stubbins}was built in 1927 and shares a minister with Edenfield Parish. Both these churches belong to the Church of England.
